N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 15.3 - Information to be given patients

State Regulations
(a) Each
person admitted to a facility shall be informed by an appropriate staff member, at the time of admission, of the character and class of the facility. (b) Each patient shall be given notice of his
or her status and rights at the time of admission to the facility in accordance
with the procedures in the above-mentioned manuals. Patients unable to read
written notice of status and rights shall have same read and explained to them
by an appropriate staff member in an appropriate language. (c) Patients shall be reinformed of their
status and rights as required by law in accordance with procedures in the
manuals hereinbefore mentioned. Facility staff members shall provide such
information about a patient's status and rights at other times upon
request. Notes
